subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Television
lead_paragraph: CBS and Turner executives confirmed that the Hall of Famer Charles Barkley and others from TNT’s N.B.A. coverage would be part of their joint effort for the N.C.A.A. tournament starting this season.
snippet: CBS and Turner executives confirmed that the Hall of Famer Charles Barkley and others from TNT’s N.B.A. coverage would be part of their joint effort for the N.C.A.A. tournament starting this season.
